# Consultancy {{< fa feather-pointed >}}

I have experience asking scientific questions, designing research, and implementing statistical methods, with a focus on actionable meaningful insights from data. I have the technical and communication skills to work effectively at every stage of the data science life cycle, using the tools required for the project.

If you want to hire me, here is a short list of some of my areas of expertise:

- Research design
- Statistical inference
- Machine learning
- Data visualisation
- Scientific communication

Please use this form for all enquiries about consultancy, collaborations, or speaking engagements.
